i1.name: Center of the Universe
i1.cooldown: {{tt|1|The time within which the same star cannot damage the same target twice.}}
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Aurelion Sol''' is constantly orbited by three ''Stars'', each doing a full circumference in {{fd|5.25}} seconds, and beyond them exists an {{as|Outer Limit|buzzword}} affecting his damaging [[Champion ability|abilities]].

Each ''Star'' deals {{as|{{pp|10+2*x for 5; then + 3*x for 2; then + 6*x for 4; then + 10*x|formula=10 + 2 per level until lvl 5, then + 3 until lvl 7, then + 6 per level until lvl 11, then + 10 per level}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|type = [[File:Celestial Expansion.png|20px|border|link=]] Celestial Expansion's Rank|5 to 25 for 5}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemies that come into contact with them as well as executes enemy {{tip|minions}} that have less than {{sti|health|{{as|25 health}}}}, including if they are brought to or below that threshold.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Aurelion Sol is constantly orbited by three Stars, each doing a full circumference in 5.25 seconds, and beyond them exists an Outer Limit affecting his damaging Champion ability.
Each Star deals 10+2*x for 5; then + 3*x for 2; then + 6*x for 4; then + 10*xundefined − (based on level) (+ 5undefined − 25 for 5undefined (based on level) (+ 25% AP) magic damage to enemies that come into contact with them as well as executes enemy minions that have less than 25 health, including if they are brought to or below that threshold.
i1.notes:
* The ''Stars'' orbit counterclockwise around '''Aurelion Sol'''.
* '''Aurelion Sol's''' ''Stars'' have independent {{tip|sight|vision}} hitboxes, meaning that they may remain visible even while he is within a {{tip|brush}}, and must be in the brush themselves in order to be hidden.
* An individual ''Star'' must complete at least one third of its orbit before it can damage the same target again. 
* In the event that an enemy orbits around '''Aurelion Sol''' at the same rate as his ''Stars'' without leaving their hitbox, they will take damage once every third of the way around.

r1.name: Voice of Light
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Aurelion Sol''' exhales a wave of star fire in the target direction, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area for 2 seconds from the start of the cast time, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within its path, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds and, if they are within the {{as|Outer Limit|buzzword}}, {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|0.125}} seconds and {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} to it.
'''''Aurelion Sol''' {{tip|channel|channels}} over {{fd|0.3}} seconds until the star fire reaches maximum range. Voice of Light cannot be {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} by {{tip|crowd control}}.''
''{{ai|W|Aurelion Sol}} can be cast during Voice of Light''.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Aurelion Sol exhales a wave of star fire in the target direction, granting sight of the area for 2 seconds from the start of the cast time, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path, slowing them for 2 seconds and, if they are within the Outer Limit, stunning them for 0.125 seconds and knocking them back to it.
Aurelion Sol channels over 0.3 seconds until the star fire reaches maximum range. Voice of Light cannot be interrupted by crowd control.
W can be cast during Voice of Light.
